args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Incorrect Weight Information on Label

Alliance RV, LLC (Alliance) is recalling certain 2025 Avenue 23ML travel trailers.  The Federal Placard may have the incorrect Unloaded Vehicle Weight (UVW) and Cargo Carrying Capacity (CCC) information, allowing the trailer to be overloaded.An overloaded vehicle increases the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 152.0
